I know "ContentTypeRegExFilter" should be "ContentTypeRegExpFilter" -- 
it =
was mispelled on Tree's blog if I remember correctly.

I assume this isn't =
your problem, but given I don't know anything 
about how you're running you=
r crawl, I thought I'd throw it out there.

-Adam
